text: Liga Deportiva Universitaria de Cuenca is a football club based in Cuenca, Ecuador currently in the Second Category Ecuadorian football Championship. ==Honors== *Championship Champion Provincial Azuay (4): 2004, 2005, 2007, 2010 *Serie B (1): 1977 -E1 *Runner up of the Series B of Ecuador (1): 1980 -E1 *Runner up Second Category (2): 1986, 1988 Category:Football clubs in Ecuador Category:Association football clubs established in 1972 Category:Cuenca, Ecuador Category:1972 establishments in Ecuador
title: L.D.U. Cuenca
